content.prompt: Which of the following was a major characteristic of the English monarchy in the eighteenth century?

choices.label: A return to its "divine right" position of the seventeenth century
A steadily widening discrepancy between its theoretical and its real powers
Its growth in power because of its many victories over the French
Its refusal to support the emerging cabinet system
Its growing wealth due to effective taxation policies

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
